unitCategories.name: Fundamental
unitCategories.description: Fundamental SI units and basic derived units

units.name: Meter
units.description: Meter - SI base unit of length.

units.name: Kilometer
units.description: Kilometer - 1000 meters.

units.name: Centimeter
units.description: Centimeter - 0.01 meters.

units.name: Millimeter
units.description: Millimeter - 0.001 meters.

units.name: Foot
units.description: Foot - Imperial unit of length.

units.name: Inch
units.description: Inch - Imperial unit of length.

units.name: Micrometer
units.description: Micrometer - 0.000001 meters.

units.name: Nanometer
units.description: Nanometer - 0.000000001 meters.

units.name: Angstrom
units.description: Angstrom - 10⁻¹⁰ meters, used for atomic scales.

units.name: Yard
units.description: Yard - Imperial unit of length.

units.name: Mile
units.description: Mile - Imperial unit of length.

units.name: Kilogram
units.description: Kilogram - SI base unit of mass.

units.name: Gram
units.description: Gram - 0.001 kilograms.

units.name: Ton
units.description: Metric ton - 1000 kilograms.

units.name: Pound
units.description: Pound - Imperial unit of mass.

units.name: Ounce
units.description: Ounce - Imperial unit of mass.

units.name: Second
units.description: Second - SI base unit of time.

units.name: Minute
units.description: Minute - 60 seconds.

units.name: Hour
units.description: Hour - 3600 seconds.

units.name: Day
units.description: Day - 86400 seconds.

units.name: Year
units.description: Year - 365.25 days (31557600 seconds).

units.name: Millisecond
units.description: Millisecond - 0.001 seconds.

units.name: Microsecond
units.description: Microsecond - 0.000001 seconds.

units.name: SquareMeter
units.description: Square meter - SI derived unit of area.

units.name: SquareFoot
units.description: Square foot - Imperial unit of area.

units.name: SquareInch
units.description: Square inch - Imperial unit of area.

units.name: CubicMeter
units.description: Cubic meter - SI derived unit of volume.

units.name: Liter
units.description: Liter - 0.001 cubic meters.

units.name: Milliliter
units.description: Milliliter - 0.001 liters.

units.name: Gallon
units.description: US gallon - Imperial unit of volume.

units.name: Dimensionless
units.description: Dimensionless - Pure number or ratio with no physical units.

units.name: Radian
units.description: Radian - SI derived unit of plane angle.

units.name: Degree
units.description: Degree - Common unit of plane angle.

unitCategories.name: ClassicalMechanics
unitCategories.description: Units of mechanical quantities (force, pressure, motion)

units.name: Newton
units.description: Newton - SI derived unit of force.

units.name: Pascal
units.description: Pascal - SI derived unit of pressure.

units.name: MetersPerSecond
units.description: Meters per second - SI derived unit of velocity.

units.name: MetersPerSecondSquared
units.description: Meters per second squared - SI derived unit of acceleration.

units.name: Bar
units.description: Bar - Metric unit of pressure.

units.name: Atmosphere
units.description: Standard atmosphere - Unit of pressure.

units.name: Psi
units.description: Pounds per square inch - Imperial unit of pressure.

units.name: KilometersPerHour
units.description: Kilometers per hour - Common unit of velocity.

units.name: MilesPerHour
units.description: Miles per hour - Imperial unit of velocity.

units.name: Joule
units.description: Joule - SI derived unit of energy.

units.name: Watt
units.description: Watt - SI derived unit of power.

units.name: Calorie
units.description: Calorie - Thermochemical calorie, energy unit.

units.name: KilowattHour
units.description: Kilowatt-hour - Common unit of electrical energy.

units.name: Horsepower
units.description: Mechanical horsepower - Imperial unit of power.

units.name: NewtonSecond
units.description: Newton-second - SI derived unit of momentum.

units.name: ElectronVolt
units.description: Electron volt - Energy unit equal to electron charge times one volt.

units.name: NewtonMeter
units.description: Newton-meter - SI derived unit of torque.

units.name: PoundFoot
units.description: Pound-foot - Imperial unit of torque.

units.name: KilogramMeterSquared
units.description: Kilogram-meter squared - SI derived unit of moment of inertia.

units.name: KilogramMeterSquaredPerSecond
units.description: Kilogram-meter squared per second - SI derived unit of angular momentum.

units.name: MetersPerSecondCubed
units.description: Meters per second cubed - SI derived unit of jerk.

units.name: MetersPerSecondQuartic
units.description: Meters per second to the fourth - SI derived unit of snap.

units.name: Kelvin
units.description: Kelvin - SI base unit of thermodynamic temperature.

units.name: Celsius
units.description: Celsius - Common temperature scale.

units.name: Fahrenheit
units.description: Fahrenheit - Imperial temperature scale.

unitCategories.name: Electromagnetism
unitCategories.description: Units of electrical and electromagnetic quantities

units.name: Ampere
units.description: Ampere - SI base unit of electric current.

units.name: Volt
units.description: Volt - SI derived unit of electric potential.

units.name: VoltPerMeter
units.description: Volt per meter - SI derived unit of electric field strength.

units.name: Ohm
units.description: Ohm - SI derived unit of electric resistance.

units.name: Coulomb
units.description: Coulomb - SI derived unit of electric charge.

units.name: Farad
units.description: Farad - SI derived unit of electric capacitance.

unitCategories.name: AngularMechanics
unitCategories.description: Units of rotational motion and angular quantities

units.name: RadiansPerSecond
units.description: Radians per second - SI derived unit of angular velocity.

units.name: RevolutionsPerMinute
units.description: Revolutions per minute - Common unit of angular velocity.

units.name: RadiansPerSecondSquared
units.description: Radians per second squared - SI derived unit of angular acceleration.

units.name: RadiansPerSecondCubed
units.description: Radians per second cubed - SI derived unit of angular jerk.

unitCategories.name: Acoustics
unitCategories.description: Units of wave and oscillation phenomena

units.name: Hertz
units.description: Hertz - SI derived unit of frequency.

unitCategories.name: Optics
unitCategories.description: Units of optical and photometric quantities

units.name: Candela
units.description: Candela - SI base unit of luminous intensity.

units.name: Lumen
units.description: Lumen - SI derived unit of luminous flux.

units.name: Lux
units.description: Lux - SI derived unit of illuminance.

units.name: Diopter
units.description: Diopter - SI unit of optical power.

unitCategories.name: NuclearPhysics
unitCategories.description: Units of nuclear and radiation quantities

units.name: Becquerel
units.description: Becquerel - SI derived unit of radioactive activity.

units.name: Gray
units.description: Gray - SI derived unit of absorbed dose.

units.name: Sievert
units.description: Sievert - SI derived unit of equivalent dose.

units.name: Barn
units.description: Barn - Unit of nuclear cross section.

units.name: KilogramPerCubicMeter
units.description: Kilogram per cubic meter - SI derived unit of density.

units.name: Mole
units.description: Mole - SI base unit of amount of substance.

units.name: Molar
units.description: Molar - Moles per liter concentration.
